analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa nidassana ttika citta sampayutta duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nacittasampayutto
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭighaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe a nidassana appaṭigha

original: cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacittasampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ
na citta sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate cha
